00020 /* \file Progress.h Provides a base class for displaying progress. */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _Progress_HEADER_
00023 #define _Progress_HEADER_
00024 
00025 /*! Provides a base class definition for streaming back messages to the parent process. */
00026 class Progress
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         /*! Sets the upper limit of the range of the progress display.
00030          * @param level - level of verbosity desired.
00031          * @param mx The maximum number of steps in the task.
00032          * @param inc The number of steps performed before the progress display is updated.
00033          */
00034         virtual void SetStepProperties(int level, int mx, int inc) = 0;
00035   virtual ~Progress() { }
00036 
00037         /*! Steps the progress ahead by one count.
00038          * @param level - What level of verbosity this message should be printed at.
00039          */
00040         virtual void Step(int level) = 0;
00041 };
00042 
00043 #endif
